isValidTag

public boolean isValidTag()
Gives information if this tag seems to be valid.

Returns:
false only if this tag was generated from a ByteArray which was not a valid tag.

toByteArray

public byte[] toByteArray()
creates an ID3-Tag that can directly be written to a file

Returns:
128 bytes containing the information of this tag.
